Description: This is a used left handed Raven West RG 7200 guitar. Originally sold for $1100.00. Plays great! The sustain is fantastic! I am thinning out my "herd" and this one is hard to let go of, but new additions take up space! It has brand new 9 gauge strings on it. More information below from Raven West, sorry for the copy & paste color. Don't miss out on a great guitar! NOTE, the shipping price reflects the maximum price by distance from my location (I used Spokane WA). If your distance from me (i.e. Texas or Alabama) is cheaper, I will apply it to an invoice or refund the difference to you, guaranteed. Thanks for looking! No returns please!
